title: How do we get silver borders? how many LP do we need?
body: I wnt to knw how do we get the borders.. i wnt to get one becuz it looks cool..  How many LP do we need?

replies.body:
Borders, summoner icons, etc. are rewards given out at the end of the season.  Historically, you'll get a border just based on tier with slight differences between division.  In other words, you'll get a silver border no matter whether or not you're Silver 5 or Silver 1, but you'll get small indicators to showcase your division. 

Information about Season rewards is usually given out closer to the end of the season, but check out our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760) for general information about ranked :D
So we need to wait for the end of the season to get the border? does the tier reset after a new season?

As long as you're silver rank at the end of the season, you'll get the border. If you drop down to bronze 1 or less then you won't get any border so be careful playing ranked if you're silver 5 now unless you're confident you won't lose.
